'''1.21.110.1''' is the first Preview version for [[Minecraft Education 1.21.131]], released on October 1, 2025, which adds features from the [[The Copper Age]] drop.<ref>{{citation|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log|title=Minecraft Education Change Log|website=edusupport.minecraft.net|author=Justin}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.21.100|Bedrock Edition 1.21.111}}
* Added features and items from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.100]] and [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.111]], '''[[The Copper Age]]'''.
* Added the [[Music Disc Lava Chicken|"Lava Chicken" music disc]] from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.93]] and the [https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/41758309283348-Dedicated-Server-101 Dedicated Servers and Cross Tenant hosting.]

== Changes ==

=== General ===
* Python Notebooks has been removed as a supported IDE.

== Fixes ==
* Further improvements in performance and product stability.</onlyinclude>
